name: PacStudent - The Fish of Time
description:
A recreation of the classic game Pacman with a twist!

Level 1 is a simple recreation of the orginal game.

Level 2 adds time control powers while only giving Pacman one life, creating a more fast-paced gameplay experience.

This game was created as a part of the subject Introduction to Computer Game Development (31263) at The University of Technology Sydney (UTS)
